Security & Surveillance

Learn how AI affects the field of Security & Surveillance, One of the most important industrys for your everyday safety and privacy.

Artificial intelligence has played a growing role in security and surveillance since the late 1900s, when basic motion detection and video analytics first appeared in CCTV systems. Over time, AI-powered facial recognition and behavior analysis have enabled more accurate identification and threat detection. Today, AI continues to transform the field being used in everdy life as well situations as well as mass surveillance.

Security & Surveillance is an important utility of AI and you can learn more about it here on our Information Page, or go to our About Us page to learn more about the creators of these webpages on Security & Surveillance.
